  • Uses of Position in grave_escape.enemy

    Subclasses of Position in grave_escape.enemy
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    Enemy
    Represents an abstract enemy in the game.
    class 
    MovingEnemy
    The MovingEnemy class represents an enemy that moves towards the player on the game grid.
    class 
    StationaryEnemy
    The StationaryEnemy class represents an enemy that remains in a fixed position on the grid.

    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    Door
    objectives.Door class represents the door on the game.Grid that appears once all mandatory objectives are collected.
    class 
    Wall
    objectives.Wall class represents a objectives.Wall cell within the game.Grid that the player.Player and any enemy.MovingEnemy cannot walk into.

    static <T extends Position>
    T
    PositionUtils.isEntityAtPosition(int x, int y, List<T> entities)
    Function that compares a position (typically the player's) to all positions of Objects of a generic type in a list, to check whether the player is in the same position as any of those objects.
